activities:
Zeta Interactive works with the world's leading marketers (our clients) to develop direct mail and permission-based email marketing communications to send to their customers (clients' customers/consumers).
Zeta's role in supporting our clients may include hosting client data, compiling or procuring prospect/acquisition data for our clients, delivery of direct mail or email, tracking results of direct mail or email campaigns, analysis of data, hosting of response data collection sites, and transferring collected data back to our clients or to a Zeta hosted database.
eucountries: Denmark, Germany, Netherlands, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
